parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Crypto.Cryptor except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: decodeData
methods.summary: Decodes a source buffer into a string using the specified data type. This is a codec method used for converting data from a source buffer into a displayable string.

methods.name: encodeData
methods.summary: Encodes the source into the destination buffer using the specified data type. This is a codec method used for converting data to a destination buffer.

returns.summary: Returns the position after the encoded data inside the destination.

constants.name: ALGORITHM_3DES
constants.summary:
Set on the algorithm property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triple_DES for more details.

constants.name: ALGORITHM_AES128
constants.summary:
Set on the algorithm property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard for more details.

constants.name: ALGORITHM_CAST
constants.summary:
Set on the algorithm property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CAST-128 for more details.

constants.name: ALGORITHM_DES
constants.summary:
Set on the algorithm property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_Encryption_Standard for more details.

constants.name: ALGORITHM_RC2
constants.summary:
Set on the algorithm property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RC2 for more details.

constants.name: ALGORITHM_RC4
constants.summary:
Set on the algorithm property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RC4 for more details.

Note that while defined on Android, this algorithm is unimplemented.

constants.name: BLOCKSIZE_3DES
constants.summary: Number of bytes for blocks of the related algorithm.

constants.name: BLOCKSIZE_AES128
constants.summary: Number of bytes for blocks of the related algorithm.

constants.name: BLOCKSIZE_CAST
constants.summary: Number of bytes for blocks of the related algorithm.

constants.name: BLOCKSIZE_DES
constants.summary: Number of bytes for blocks of the related algorithm.

constants.name: BLOCKSIZE_RC2
constants.summary: Number of bytes for blocks of the related algorithm.

constants.name: DECRYPT
constants.summary: Set on the operation property. Used in the update and finish methods to indicate the operation should be to decrypt data.

constants.name: ENCRYPT
constants.summary: Set on the operation property. Used in the update and finish methods to indicate the operation should be to encrypt data.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_3DES
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_AES256
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_DES
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_MAXRC2
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_MINCAST
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_MINRC2
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: KEYSIZE_MINRC4
constants.summary: Number of bytes used to hold a key of the given type. Useful for creating instances of Titanium.Buffer to generate a key for the key property used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods.

constants.name: OPTION_ECBMODE
constants.summary:
Set on the options property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Block_cipher_mode_of_operation#Electronic_Codebook_(ECB) for more details.

constants.name: OPTION_PKCS7PADDING
constants.summary:
Set on the options property. Used in the encrypt, decrypt, update and finish methods to indicate the algorithm used.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Padding_(cryptography)#PKCS#5_and_PKCS#7 for more details.

constants.name: STATUS_ALIGNMENTERROR
constants.summary:
Used in the encodeData and Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report an error. This means that the data you are passing is not correctly padded (specifically that the entire data length including padding is not a multiple of the block size). The most likely cause is that you are truncating your encrypted data somewhere, possibly outside of this routine.

Only reported by iOS (though the constant is still defined on Android).

constants.name: STATUS_BUFFERTOOSMALL
constants.summary: Used in the encodeData and Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report an error when the buffer is not long enough to contain the result.

constants.name: STATUS_DECODEERROR
constants.summary:
Used in the encodeData and Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report an error. Input data did not decode or decrypt properly.

Only reported by iOS (though the constant is still defined on Android).

constants.name: STATUS_ERROR
constants.summary: Used in the Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report a generic error for an operation.

constants.name: STATUS_MEMORYFAILURE
constants.summary:
Used in the encodeData and Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report an error with allocating memory.

Only reported by iOS (though the constant is still defined on Android).

constants.name: STATUS_PARAMERROR
constants.summary: Used in the encodeData and Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report an error with the supplied parameters or properties.

constants.name: STATUS_SUCCESS
constants.summary: Used in the reset and release methods to report success for the operation.

constants.name: STATUS_UNIMPLEMENTED
constants.summary:
Used in the getOutputLength and various Modules.Crypto.Cryptor methods to report an error. Typically used to indicate the given algorithm/mode is not implemented in this OS version.

Android will report this status only on getOutputLength. Otherwise this status is only reported by iOS for the methods performing operations.

constants.name: TYPE_BASE64STRING
constants.summary: Used in the encodeData and decodeData methods to specify expected string format. A Base64 encoded string.

constants.name: TYPE_BLOB
constants.summary: Used in the encodeData method to specify expected input is a Ti.Blob instance.

constants.name: TYPE_HEXSTRING
constants.summary: Used in the encodeData and decodeData methods to specify expected string format. A hexadecimal formatted string. Each byte is represented by 2 hexadecimal numbers.
